title: Halo: Infinite's Box Art Filled with Easter Eggs - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.22.20
description:
Andrea Rene joins Tim to get hyped for Halo Infinite, discuss game prices, mispronounce Yakuza, and more! 

Time Stamps - 
 00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
Remember, it’s a huge Xbox week here on Kinda Funny:
TODAY at 2 pm, Greg’s streaming the Summer Game Fest Demo Event -- he’ll be playing a bunch of the demos on Xbox LIVE. Come tell him what to play.
Thursday at 9 am, we’re reacting LIVE to the Xbox Games Showcase alongside the Xcast host SnowBikeMike.
Thursday afternoon, Greg’s first playthrough of Halo: Combat Evolved starts with Tim and Andy on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
Saturday, it’s the second episode of the Xcast with SnowBikeMike, Gary, and Alanah!
Our Ghost of Tsushima Spoilercast with Sucker Punch’s Nate Fox is live as a Kinda Funny Gamescast!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:30 - Halo Infinite Box Art Revealed, Everyone Losing Their Minds
00:22:12 - Should halo change or go back to its roots? - Best Friends Q:Lexus
00:26:25 - Yakuza: Like A Dragon gets Release Date, English Dub, George Takei - Michael McWhertor, Polygon
00:30:46 - Speaking of next gen pricing, Ubisoft won’t charge more for PS5/Series X games, Jason Schreier @ Bloomberg
00:37:45 - Speaking of Ubi…
00:39:10 - Out today
00:41:30 - Reader mail   -
00:42:50 - What could Xbox show tomorrow that would kill the hype for Halo Infinite? - DJBradChill
00:50:09 - With all the talks about Microsoft wanting to buy WB Games, why is this not being viewed as giant monopoly move like Disney buying Fox, AT&T buying WB, or Google moving into the gaming space? - ZombieHighX23
00:54:10 - Squad Up:Jason(Stadia) - Jasonisback#6795
00:54:39 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg, Tim, Blessing, Andy, and Snowbike Mike (Post show for the Xbox Games Showcase)
